task.title: Phone Power Status Tutorial
task.shortdesc: This section describes how to retrieve the power status using multimode phone sub-sessions.

step.cmd: Test if the power information can be obtained using RMobilePhone::GetBatteryCaps().
step.info: Power information capabilities are described in an RMobilePhone::TMobilePhoneBatteryCaps.

step.cmd: Get the power information using RMobilePhone::GetBatteryInfo().
step.info: Power status and charge level is returned in an RMobilePhone::TMobilePhoneBatteryInfoV1 object.

step.cmd: Use RMobilePhone::NotifyBatteryInfoChange() to get the notification of any changes to the power information.

result.p: The function should return the battery power level status.

example.title: Power status example
example.p: The following code checks if the power information can be obtained, and if so, gets the charge level in a percentage value of the battery, if the phone is currently being powered by batteries.
The code assumes iMobilePhone is an RMobilePhone object.
